title: CRM and Marketing Data API
description: This API provides endpoints for managing and retrieving CRM and marketing data. It supports fetching, saving data to MongoDB, and generating reports in CSV and PDF formats.

environment_variables.description: Create a .env file in the root directory and add the following variable:
environment_variables.note: Replace <your_mongodb_connection_string> with your actual MongoDB connection string.

crm_endpoints.name: Get CRM Data
crm_endpoints.description: Fetches dummy CRM data from the CRMdata.js file.

crm_endpoints.name: Fetch and Save CRM Data to MongoDB
crm_endpoints.description: Fetches CRM data using a function and saves it to MongoDB.

crm_endpoints.name: Generate CRM Report (CSV)
crm_endpoints.description: Generates a CSV report summarizing lead statuses.
crm_endpoints.response: A downloadable CSV file named crm_report.csv.

crm_endpoints.name: Generate CRM Report (PDF)
crm_endpoints.description: Generates a PDF report summarizing lead statuses.
crm_endpoints.response: A downloadable PDF file named crm_report.pdf.

marketing_endpoints.name: Get Marketing Data
marketing_endpoints.description: Fetches dummy marketing data from the MarketingData.js file.

marketing_endpoints.name: Fetch and Save Marketing Data to MongoDB
marketing_endpoints.description: Fetches marketing data using a function and saves it to MongoDB.

marketing_endpoints.name: Generate Marketing Report (CSV)
marketing_endpoints.description: Generates a CSV report summarizing marketing campaigns.
marketing_endpoints.response: A downloadable CSV file named report.csv.

marketing_endpoints.name: Generate Marketing Report (PDF)
marketing_endpoints.description: Generates a PDF report summarizing marketing campaigns.
marketing_endpoints.response: A downloadable PDF file named report.pdf.

usage_examples.description: Fetch and Save Marketing Data to MongoDB
